page.title: 11A CHILD'S DAY, CALDER VALE 1
page.content: I wake up in the morning. It is a school day. My mum is going to work so she is up too. After breakfast my mum makes my packed lunch which usually consists of four sandwiches, a packet of crisps, a piece of cake or a chocolate biscuit. My mum works at the Village Store.It is her busiest day today as it is Friday and today they have cream cakes. To get to school I have to walk through the woods. It is quite a steep path. In the spring it is full of blue bells but it is still just as hard to walk up. At home time I go into the shop to get the key off my mum. I usually get to the shop at half past three. On a Friday the mill finishes at 3.30 and there is a queue in the shop so I have to wait quite a long time.
